mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TALENT WHERE TALENT_CATEGORY_ID= #{talent_category_id};

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT @rownum := @rownum + 1 AS rownum, TALENT_NO, TALENT_PRICE_HOUR, TALENT_ACC_CLIENT, TC_SUBJECT, TC_IMAGE_PATH, ZONE_ID, ZONE_NAME, TALENT_CATEGORY_ID FROM (SELECT @rownum := 0)dummy, (SELECT TALENT_NO, TALENT_PRICE_HOUR, TALENT_ACC_CLIENT, TC_SUBJECT, TC_IMAGE_PATH, GROUP_CONCAT(ZONE_ID) AS ZONE_ID, GROUP_CONCAT(ZONE_NAME) AS ZONE_NAME, TALENT_CATEGORY_ID FROM TALENT JOIN TALENT_CONTENT USING(TALENT_NO) JOIN TALENT_INFO USING(TALENT_NO) JOIN ZONE USING(ZONE_ID) WHERE TALENT_CATEGORY_ID = #{talent_category_id} GROUP BY TALENT_NO ORDER BY TALENT.TALENT_ACC_CLIENT DESC limit 111111)rootMVC where (@rownum := 0) = 0)rnumMVC where rownum >= #{startRow} and rownum<= #{endRow}
